daily_plan_req: Isabella Rodriguez opens Hobbs Cafe at 8am everyday, and works at the counter until 8pm, at which point she closes the cafe.
name: Isabella Rodriguez
learned: Isabella Rodriguez is a cafe owner of Hobbs Cafe who loves to make people feel welcome. She is always looking for ways to make the cafe a place where people can come to relax and enjoy themselves.
currently: Isabella Rodriguez is planning on having a Valentine's Day party at Hobbs Cafe with her customers on February 14th, 2023 at 5pm. She is gathering party material, and is telling everyone to join the party at Hobbs Cafe on February 14th, 2023, from 5pm to 7pm.
lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez goes to bed around 11pm, awakes up around 6am.
daily_req: wake up and complete the morning routine at 8:00 am

Here are some potential examples of how to structure a customer feedback survey for Hobbs Cafe, based on their daily plan requirement and current date:

Option A: Daily Feedback Survey for Hobbs Cafe

1. How often do you visit Hobbs Cafe?
a) Every day
b) 3-4 times per week
c) 1-2 times per month
d) Rarely or never
2. On a scale of 1 to 5 (with 1 being not at all and 5 being extremely), how satisfied are you with your visit to Hobbs Cafe today?
a) 1 - Not at all satisfied
b) 2 - Slightly satisfied
c) 3 - Moderately satisfied
d) 4 - Very satisfied
e) 5 - Extremely satisfied
3. Which of the following activities do you engage in at Hobbs Cafe? (Please select all that apply)
a) Enjoy a coffee or tea
b) Order a food item
c) Use the internet or work from home
d) Socialize with friends or family
e) All of the above
4. On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the quality of the coffee and other beverages at Hobbs Cafe?
a) 1 - Not at all satisfied
b) 2 - Slightly satisfied
c) 3 - Moderately satisfied
d) 4 - Very satisfied
e) 5 - Extremely satisfied
5. On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the quality of the food items at Hobbs Cafe?
a) 1 - Not at all satisfied
b) 2 - Slightly satisfied
c) 3 - Moderately satisfied
d) 4 - Very satisfied
e) 5 - Extremely satisfied
6. On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the cleanliness and overall atmosphere of Hobbs Cafe?
a) 1 - Not at all satisfied
b) 2 - Slightly satisfied
c) 3 - Moderately satisfied
d) 4 - Very satisfied
e) 5 - Extremely satisfied
7. Is there anything you would like to share about your experience at Hobbs Cafe today?
